channel.title: redjade_hu tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from redjade_hu.

item.description: @ggreenwald yes, #Murica Libs are going to be sad about Liz Cheney loosing her seat, and up set about how rude GG's tweets are, But WTF, I look at this and think: How in the F did Mother Jones get to be so awful??!
item.source:markdown: @ggreenwald yes, #Murica Libs are going to be sad about Liz Cheney loosing her seat, and up set about how rude GG's tweets are, But WTF, I look at this and think: How in the F did Mother Jones get to be so awful??!

item.description: @mehdirhasan once again, the myth of the 'Moderate Republican' exposed
